TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositionContainer extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.ICompositionService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class CompositionContainer Inherits ExportProvider Implements ICompositionService, IDisposable
type CompositionContainer = class inherit ExportProvider interface ICompositionService interface IDisposable

summary.span: 管理組件的撰寫。

span.span: Manages the composition of parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件會有兩個主要的目的應用程式中。A object serves two major purposes in an application. 首先，它會追蹤的哪些部分可供組合，以及它們的相依性是什麼，並執行組合時的可用集合組件的變更。First, it keeps track of which parts are available for composition and what their dependencies are, and performs composition whenever the set of available parts changes. 第二，它會提供應用程式取得組成組件執行個體或填滿的可組合的組件的相依性的方法。Second, it provides the methods by which the application gets instances of composed parts or fills the dependencies of a composable part. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 組件可供容器是直接或透過屬性。Parts can be made available to the container either directly or through the property. 在此找到的所有部分可滿足匯入，以及直接加入任何組件的容器。All the parts discoverable in this are available to the container to fulfill imports, along with any parts added directly. 方法可讓具現化組件新增至現有的容器。The method allows instantiated parts to be added to an existing container. 假設成功組合，這些組件會有其填滿容器，從擷取的組件的匯入和匯出其可供其他組件。Assuming composition is successful, these parts will have their imports filled with parts retrieved from the container, and their exports will be available to other parts. 標示為可重新撰寫匯入將會註冊重新撰寫。Imports marked as recomposable will be registered for recomposition. 方法允許將不新增到容器填滿其匯入的部分。The method allows a part to have its imports filled without being added to the container. 如果有組合成功，組件的匯入將會填入，但組件的匯出將無法使用其他組件和沒有匯入將會註冊重新撰寫。If the composition is successful, the part's imports will be filled, but the part's exports will not be available to other parts and no imports will be registered for recomposition. 一定會處置物件。 objects should always be disposed. 當呼叫方法時，物件也會處置它已建立的所有組件。When the method is called, the object also disposes all the parts that it has created. A可從多個執行緒存取的物件必須以建構`isThreadSafe`參數設為`true`，並使用建構函式。A object that can be accessed from multiple threads must be constructed with the `isThreadSafe` parameter set to `true`, using the constructor. 效能會稍微慢一點 when`isThreadSafe`是`true`，因此我們建議您將此參數設定為`false`在單一執行緒的情況下。Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!WARNING] > A本身，或具有對它的參考組件，應該永遠不會匯入。A should never import itself, or a part that has a reference to it. 這類的參考可能會允許不受信任的組件才能存取容器中的所有組件。Such a reference could allow an untrusted part to gain access all the parts in the container. ## Examples 在下列範例中，物件初始化的類別目錄，以及用來填滿的組件匯入。In the following example, a object is initialized with a catalog and is used to fill the imports of a part. 此範例使用屬性化程式設計模型。This example uses the Attributed Programming Model. [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以從多個執行緒存取的物件必須設定`isThreadSafe`參數來`true`。A object that can be accessed from multiple threads must set the `isThreadSafe` parameter to `true`. 效能會稍微慢一點 when`isThreadSafe`是`true`，因此我們建議您將此參數設定為`false`在單一執行緒的情況下。Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`.

summary.span: 在容器中加入或移除指定之 的組件，然後執行撰寫。

span.span: Adds or removes the parts in the specified from the container and executes composition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是直接新增或移除容器中的組件的主要方式。This method is the primary way of directly adding or removing parts from the container. 一定會維持穩定，它包含的狀態。The will always maintain a stable, composed state. 因此，呼叫使用空不一定要開始撰寫。Therefore, calling with an empty is never necessary to start composition. 請改為呼叫方法，每當您需要將變更組件提供給。Instead, call the method whenever you need to make changes to the parts available to the . 可以包含要加入的組件和要移除的組件。The can contain both parts to be added and parts to be removed. 重新撰寫，就會進行一次每次呼叫。Recomposition will take place only once for each call to . ## Examples 在此簡單範例中，三個部分會建立並加入至，並顯示已填入所有匯入擷取一個組件。In this simple example, three parts are created and added to the , and one part is retrieved to show that all imports have been filled. 此範例使用屬性化程式設計模型。This example uses the Attributed Programming Model. [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer.Compose#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer.compose/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer.Compose#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer.compose/vb/module1.vb#1)]

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 類別目前的執行個體所使用的全部資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作不應該將視為錯誤相關的基數不相符，且不應該擲回例外狀況相關的基數不相符。Implementations should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches. 例如，如果匯入要求一個匯出，而且該提供者有沒有相符的匯出或多個方法應傳回空的集合物件。For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the method should return an empty collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的行為有所不同的實作產生執行個體。The behavior of this method may vary depending on the implementation of the that produced the instance. 一般而言，非共用的匯出都應該與容器中斷連結。As a rule, non-shared exports should be detached from the container. 例如，將只發行如果它來自已建構下內容。For example, the will only release an if it comes from a that was constructed under a context. 在此內容中的版本可讓您表示的相依性鏈結的卸離對容器與呼叫的參考的物件`Dispose`上物件所需。Release in this context means walking the dependency chain of the objects, detaching references from the container and calling `Dispose` on the objects as needed. 如果建構底下內容會做任何事，與指定可能正由其他要求者。If the was constructed under a context the will do nothing, as the specified may being used by other requestors. 這些將只會中斷連結在容器本身處置時。Those will only be detached when the container is itself disposed.
